text: Soni nkalombela (jenumanja Asilamu wachilume) achakongwe wagalagatila isanamu mpaka ali akulupilile, chisimu kapolo jwachikongwe jwakulupilila juwele jwambone kumpunda (nnukosyo) jwagalagatila isanamu atamuno juli junnonyelesye. Nombe soni (Asilamu wachikongwe) nkaalombekasya ku achalume wagalagatila isanamu mpaka ali akulupilile, chisimu kapolo jwachilume jwakulupilila juwele jwambone kumpunda (nnukosyo) jwagalagatila isanamu atamuno juli junnonyelesye. Wanganyao akuwilanjila ku Moto, nambo Allah akuwilanjila ku Mbepo ni chikululuko mwa lisosa Lyakwe, ni akusalichisyaga ma Aya Gakwe ku wandu kuti awe wakumbuchila
